about_the_game:
INTERACTIVE MAIN MENU

You will control Fubuki Goro herself as your personnal secretary. This will allow you to visit the lounge part of the SPF and walk next to the special agents.

STEALTH PHASE

When the mission start, you will have to infiltrate an industrial complex. Several cyborg specialized in detection patrol the hallways. Find a cover point and avoid them until you arrive in the generator room. An easy to learn cover system will you go across the map undetected!

COMBAT PHASE

The combat phase follows the stealth phase once you arrive inside the generator room. The combat controls are then unlocked and allows you to jump and use your weapon or your powers.
5 type of cyborgs
Different type of cyborgs will appear: some are easy to fight some are really hard.
You start each combat phase with some of your fighting skills unlocked. You can unlock them by eliminating more cyborgs at the same time, the rage bar will be completely full and you will be able to unleash powerful combos and deal more damage.

SURVIVAL CHALLENGE


FIght an illimited number of cyborgs and allows you to test your skills and improve them at the same time.
Illimited fight= illimited fun!

HISTORY

You are a female agent, one of the most powerful one. You have the ability to manipulate a cybernetic power which allows you to make power and fast movement.
As a consequence, you have been send to Japan at the shinken batoryu sword school. Since then, you cut and dash any ennemy of the public order.
In your arsenal, you can count on a powerful energetic sword that can cut everything including humans or cyborg...That will be helpful soon
CYBORG UPRISING
The biggest facility for cyborg manufacturing, EXE corp, has fallen in chaos because of a cyborg uprising. The cause is not clear but it seems that one cyborg has been manufactured with a new AI system which allows to feel.....emotions. This cyborg, we call it the original has taken control of all the cyborgs inside the facility and it is now menacing all the city.

The media has called this event: the Takeover!

CONTROLS

You basically just need a mouse and a keyboard. The game is compatible with controller during the stealth and the fight mode.

SPECIAL FEATURE

Dynamic clothes system:
What happens when you take too much damages? You lose all your clothes except your lingerie!

content_descriptors.notes:
The character will lose part of its clothes which leads to nudity. But the nudity is never total.

Hence, you will see underwears and bikinis.

Some particle looks like blood, they appear when the character get hitten by something suring combat.

detailed_description:
Wishlist Takeover today!


Accessibility

You basically just need a keyboard and a mouse to play game. So you don't need to have or buy a controller gamepad to play Takeover.
And it won't take more than 3GB of your hard disk.


LIGHT GAME

LESS THAN 3 GB...It should find its place in your hard drive!


About the Game


INTERACTIVE MAIN MENU

You will control Fubuki Goro herself as your personnal secretary. This will allow you to visit the lounge part of the SPF and walk next to the special agents.

STEALTH PHASE

When the mission start, you will have to infiltrate an industrial complex. Several cyborg specialized in detection patrol the hallways. Find a cover point and avoid them until you arrive in the generator room. An easy to learn cover system will you go across the map undetected!

COMBAT PHASE

The combat phase follows the stealth phase once you arrive inside the generator room. The combat controls are then unlocked and allows you to jump and use your weapon or your powers.
5 type of cyborgs
Different type of cyborgs will appear: some are easy to fight some are really hard.
You start each combat phase with some of your fighting skills unlocked. You can unlock them by eliminating more cyborgs at the same time, the rage bar will be completely full and you will be able to unleash powerful combos and deal more damage.

SURVIVAL CHALLENGE


FIght an illimited number of cyborgs and allows you to test your skills and improve them at the same time.
Illimited fight= illimited fun!

HISTORY

You are a female agent, one of the most powerful one. You have the ability to manipulate a cybernetic power which allows you to make power and fast movement.
As a consequence, you have been send to Japan at the shinken batoryu sword school. Since then, you cut and dash any ennemy of the public order.
In your arsenal, you can count on a powerful energetic sword that can cut everything including humans or cyborg...That will be helpful soon

The biggest facility for cyborg manufacturing, EXE corp, has fallen in chaos because of a cyborg uprising. The cause is not clear but it seems that one cyborg has been manufactured with a new AI system which allows to feel.....emotions. This cyborg, we call it the original has taken control of all the cyborgs inside the facility and it is now menacing all the city.

The media has called this event: the Takeover!

What happens when you take too much damages? You lose all your clothes except your lingerie!
name: Takeover

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: XP/ Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Dual Core processor / 2.6 GHz Intel Single Core processor
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB DirectX 9.0c compatible card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: mouse and keyboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 Famille
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-11400H @ 2.70GHz 2.69 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce FTX 3060
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: mouse and keyboard

short_description: Join the magnificent Fubuki, Anna and Sakura in their epic fight against the corrupt cyborgs of the EXE group in this SEXY hack and slash that takes inspiration from the best while adding its own personal touch.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
